description: A healthy treat for adults and kids, a fun quick dish.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango Lassi - Icy Poles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare stick mixer with above ingredients. You can alter the sweetness by adding more vanilla bean Greek yoghurt or less.You can use fresh mangoes but as an alternate we use Woolworths frozen mango pieces.
Once yoghurt, mango pieces and a dash of cinnamon have been added to the stick mixer, blend until you like the consistency. We generally go for a smooth paste.
Fill your icy poles with the mango lassi mixture.
Freeze overnight if possible. Pull out of icy pole cup and enjoy.
